name: Yume Nikki GB
description:
This is a game in which you traverse the extremely dark world inside a dream.

Interact with the bed to go to the dream world and you can save your progress interacting with the diary on the desk (it's not useful yet).

Controls:

  • Direcional Pad - Move
  • A - Interact
  • B - Close menus
  • Start - Menu
  • Select - Wake up

Start menu:

  • Effects (not implemented yet) - Change Madotsuki's appearence with a special ability
  • ... (temporary) - warp to Poniko's Room
  • Exit - Close the start menu

Any feedback will be appreciated.

Original Yume Nikki by Kikiwama.

Made with GB Studio.
